title: Notwithstanding anything contained in these regulations, in case of redevelopment of plot/(s) having cessed structures/s and having reservation in the DP, the land component of the said cessed structure as per Zonal (basic) FSI shall be deemed to have been automatically deleted from reservation
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in these regulations, in case of redevelopment of plot/(s) having cessed structures/s and having reservation in the DP, the land component of the said cessed structure as per Zonal (basic) FSI shall be deemed to have been automatically deleted from reservation.
section: 17(3) Not withstanding anything contained in these Regulations Development of Reserved land falling under the various provisions of Regulation No. 33 shall be as under:
